post.title: Captainmeta4 has been banned from Ruqqus

author.bio:
Ruqqus cofounder and lead backend developer.

https://github.com/captainmeta4
author.bio_html:
Ruqqus cofounder and lead backend developer.

https://github.com/captainmeta4

body:
FDA audit prep is for my day job. We are going through our first medical device approval process, which means there will be a guaranteed FDA audit as part of that approval process.

The mock audit is to prepare us for the real audit. We hire a consulting firm that specializes in this sort of thing (often because they hire former FDA auditors), and they interrogate you the way the FDA will, and identify shortcomings for you to fix before the FDA finds them.
body_html:
FDA audit prep is for my day job. We are going through our first medical device approval process, which means there will be a guaranteed FDA audit as part of that approval process.

The mock audit is to prepare us for the real audit. We hire a consulting firm that specializes in this sort of thing (often because they hire former FDA auditors), and they interrogate you the way the FDA will, and identify shortcomings for you to fix before the FDA finds them.

body:
I was exiled from +the_donaid (`donaId`,  not `Donald`). Since exiles have no effect on admins (other than sending a system message), I made the thread that @pepethefrog linked. 

When people pointed out that it technically counted as exile evasion, I banned myself for it just long enough for OP to capture the screenshot.
body_html:
I was exiled from +The_DonaId (donaId, not Donald). Since exiles have no effect on admins (other than sending a system message), I made the thread that @pepethefrog linked.

When people pointed out that it technically counted as exile evasion, I banned myself for it just long enough for OP to capture the screenshot.

parent.body:
FDA audit prep is for my day job. We are going through our first medical device approval process, which means there will be a guaranteed FDA audit as part of that approval process.

The mock audit is to prepare us for the real audit. We hire a consulting firm that specializes in this sort of thing (often because they hire former FDA auditors), and they interrogate you the way the FDA will, and identify shortcomings for you to fix before the FDA finds them.
parent.body_html:
FDA audit prep is for my day job. We are going through our first medical device approval process, which means there will be a guaranteed FDA audit as part of that approval process.

The mock audit is to prepare us for the real audit. We hire a consulting firm that specializes in this sort of thing (often because they hire former FDA auditors), and they interrogate you the way the FDA will, and identify shortcomings for you to fix before the FDA finds them.
